attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My nephews kitten was shot by a monster with a airgun. It took him three days to die in agony. These guns are dangerous to people and animals and I can see no good in them what so ever. A ban would save thousands of innocent animals a year and would save a lot of sorrow and grief for families.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
